edu.berkeley.path.beats.simulator
Class Scenario

java.lang.Object
  edu.berkeley.path.beats.jaxb.Scenario
      edu.berkeley.path.beats.simulator.Scenario

public final class Scenario
extends edu.berkeley.path.beats.jaxb.Scenario

Load, manipulate, and run scenarios.

A scenario is a collection of,

  • networks (nodes, links, sensors, and signals),
  • network connections,
  • initial conditions,
  • weaving factor profiles,
  • split ratio profiles,
  • downstream boundary conditions,
  • events,
  • controllers,
  • fundamental diagram profiles,
  • path segments,
  • decision points,
  • routes,
  • background demand profiles, and
  • OD demand profiles.

run

public void run(SimulationSettings simsettings,
                java.util.Properties owr_props)
         throws SiriusException
Run the scenario numRepetitions times, save output to text files.

The scenario is reset and run multiple times in sequence. All probabilistic quantities are re-sampled between runs. Output files are created with a common prefix with the index of the simulation appended to the file name.

Parameters:
simsettings - the simulation settings
owr_props - the output writer properties
Throws:
SiriusException

run

public void run(java.lang.Double timestart,
                java.lang.Double timeend,
                double outdt,
                java.lang.String outputfileprefix)
         throws SiriusException
Run the scenario once, save output to text files.

The scenario is reset and run once. Output files are created with a common prefix with the index of the simulation appended to the file name.

Parameters:
timestart -
timeend -
outdt -
outputfileprefix -
Throws:
SiriusException

run

public SiriusStateTrajectory run(java.lang.Double timestart,
                                 java.lang.Double timeend,
                                 double outdt)
                          throws SiriusException
Run the scenario once, return the state trajectory.

The scenario is reset and run once.

Returns:
An object with the history of densities and flows for all links in the scenario.
Throws:
SiriusException

advanceNSeconds

public boolean advanceNSeconds(double nsec)
                        throws SiriusException
Advance the simulation nsec seconds.

Move the simulation forward nsec seconds and stops. Returns true if the operation completes succesfully. Returns false if the end of the simulation is reached.

Parameters:
nsec - Number of seconds to advance.
Throws:
SiriusException

addController

public boolean addController(Controller C)
Add a controller to the scenario.

Controllers can only be added if a) the scenario is not currently running, and b) the controller is valid.

Parameters:
C - The controller
Returns:
true if the controller was successfully added, false otherwise.

addEvent

public boolean addEvent(Event E)
Add an event to the scenario.

Events are not added if the scenario is running. This method does not validate the event.

Parameters:
E - The event
Returns:
true if the event was successfully added, false otherwise.

getInitialDensityForNetwork

public double[][] getInitialDensityForNetwork(java.lang.String network_id)
Get the initial density state for the network with given id.

Parameters:
network_id - String id of the network
Returns:
A two-dimensional array of doubles where the first dimension is the link index (ordered as in Network.getListOfLinks()) and the second is the vehicle type (ordered as in getVehicleTypeNames())

getDensityForNetwork

public double[][] getDensityForNetwork(java.lang.String network_id,
                                       int ensemble)
Get the current density state for the network with given id.

Parameters:
network_id - String id of the network
Returns:
A two-dimensional array of doubles where the first dimension is the link index (ordered as in Network.getListOfLinks()) and the second is the vehicle type (ordered as in getVehicleTypeNames())

initialize_run

public void initialize_run(int numEnsemble)
                    throws SiriusException
Initialize the run before using advanceNSeconds(double)

This method performs certain necessary initialization tasks on the scenario. In particular it locks the scenario so that elements may not be added mid-run. It also resets the scenario rolling back all profiles and clocks.

Parameters:
numEnsemble - Number of simulations to run in parallel
Throws:
SiriusException

                      throws SiriusException
Add a demand profile to the scenario. If a profile already exists for the origin link, then replace it.

Throws:
SiriusException
